text: “If anyone commits a trespass, and sins unwittingly regarding the LORD’s holy things, then he shall bring his trespass offering to the LORD: a ram without defect from the flock, according to your estimation in silver by shekels, according to the shekel5:15 A shekel is about 10 grams or about 0.35 ounces. of the sanctuary, for a trespass offering.
